snippet.title: LONE WARRIOR - Teaser
snippet.description:
SUPER LONE SURVIVOR for PC & Nintendo Switch is a complete remake of the original game, with new content, artwork and features, smooth scrolling, improved shaders and effects, 4:3 and VGA resolution support a completely remastered audio track and new music. Coming 2022.


Following that, LONE WARRIOR is an entirely new game, due 2022-3.



The new PC version features UHD resolution support, comprehensive yet simple gamepad support.



twitter.com/jasperbyrne
superflatgames.com/wordpress
